messages.title: A personal message for
messages.content: Britain is firmly on the road to economic recovery. We are growing faster than any major economy and have cut the deficit. More than 2.2 million more people have jobs, interest rates have stayed low, pension has been increased by £800, over-25s will earn minimum £6.70/hr, and income taxes for working class has been cut. The Conservatives have made this progress, don’t let Labour and SNP ruin it.

messages.title: The choice at the General Election
messages.content: Voting for UKIP will hand keys of No. 10 to Miliband, poll finds.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Growing faster than any major economy, cut deficit, more jobs, low interest rates, increased pension, higher minimum wage, cut income taxes.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Ed Miliband, Vince Cable, Nicola Sturgeon, Alex Salmond
